attributes.additional_details: Less people on public transport which will equate to a lower coronavirus transmission risk, we need more people to be on the roads and less people on public transport therefore we need the government to reopen driving tests centres so key workers,  people who cannot work from home and essential travel be done privately
attributes.background: Reopen the test centres in tier 4, those who cannot work from home need transport and if we reopen the test centres more people will be able to get cars and less people on public transport
